title: 💚Beautiful Little Studio Close to Downtown 💚
posting_body: 🤗 Great little studio that's a quick shot to downtown, or walkable to river.
You're located close to grocery, restaurants, coffee shops, bars and daily living retail.
🤩 Community offers quaint pool with lounge seating and grilling stations.
Gym with free weights, cardio machines, and bikes.
💯 Apartment offers hardwood flooring, nice contemporary kitchens, patios and balconies for fresh air, and w/d in-unit!
Text for more info or a tour and we'll get you set!
My service is 100% FREE for you!
*Pricing and lease terms subject to change by the property.
Pictures are taken from the property but may not be exact unit.
I can get you all the detailed info over to you.*
